bug.author: heucoder
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>if st.checkbox('Show dataframe'): chart_data = pd.DataFrame( np.random.randn(20, 3), columns=['a', 'b', 'c'])
st.line_chart(chart_data) </denchmark-code>
when i run this code, it will raise a bug <denchmark-code>TypeError: 'ellipsis' object is not iterable Traceback: File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/streamlit/ScriptRunner.py", line 324, in _run_script exec(code, module.__dict__) File "/root/git_project/streamlitTest/streamlitTest1.py", line 16, in <module> st.area_chart(chartdata) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/streamlit/__init__.py", line 152, in wrapped_method return method.__get__(dg)(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 136, in wrapped_method return dg._enqueue_new_element_delta(marshall_element, delta_type, last_index) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 393, in _enqueue_new_element_delta rv = marshall_element(msg.delta.new_element) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 134, in marshall_element return method(dg, element, *args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 978, in area_chart import streamlit.elements.altair as altair File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/streamlit/elements/altair.py", line 25, in <module> import altair as alt File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/altair/__init__.py", line 4, in <module> from .vegalite import * File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/altair/vegalite/__init__.py", line 2, in <module> from .v4 import * File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/altair/vegalite/v4/__init__.py", line 3, in <module> from .api import * File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/altair/vegalite/v4/api.py", line 15, in <module> from .display import renderers, VEGALITE_VERSION, VEGAEMBED_VERSION, VEGA_VERSION File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/altair/vegalite/v4/display.py", line 4, in <module> from ..display import Displayable File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/altair/vegalite/display.py", line 1, in <module> from ..utils.display import Displayable, default_renderer_base, json_renderer_base File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/altair/utils/display.py", line 20, in <module> class RendererRegistry(PluginRegistry[RendererType]): File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 1025, in __getitem__ tvars = _type_vars(params) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 284, in _type_vars _get_type_vars(types, tvars) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 279, in _get_type_vars t._get_type_vars(tvars) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 786, in _get_type_vars _get_type_vars(self.__args__, tvars) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/typing.py", line 277, in _get_type_vars for t in types: </denchmark-code>
I don't why and how to solve it.
Streamlit version: 0.5.3 Python version: 3.5.2

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/heucoder>@heucoder</denchmark-link> , Looks like an issue in Python 3.5.2 that has been fixed in more recent releases: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/python/typing/issues/259>python/typing#259</denchmark-link>
Please update to Python 3.5.3 or newer to fix this. Let us know if this helps!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jrhone>@jrhone</denchmark-link>
thank you very much. i have updated Python version from 3.5.2 to 3.6.4 and solve this error.
